name: Ginger Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: ginger sugar (seal 6 ounces turbinado sugar with 1 ounce fresh ginger root in a jar for a week; shake the jar every day)
1/2 ounce ginger-infused simple syrup (simple syrup macerated with peeled fresh ginger root; 4 ounces ginger will yield one pint; macerate two days)

recipeInstructions.text: Swipe the orange peel on the rim of a cocktail glass; press the wet rim down into a shallow dish of the ginger sugar, to ''frost'' the rim.
Combine the remaining ingredients in a shaker with ice; shake and strain into the glass, to the rim. Garnish with peel.
